title: Nintendo Dramatically Increases Switch Production - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.06.17
description:
Thanks to our sponsor DraftKings. Play for a hundred thousand dollars in total prizes this Sunday at http://www.draftkings.com/ with the promo code KINDAFUNNY. 

Tim and Andy talk about Nintendo Switch supply, Destiny 2, and more.

3:55 ropers report
Xb1x hidden Master Chief
6:53 destiny 2 iron banner, prestige raid
11:35 switch production is UP!
14:50 Nintendo stock is UP!
19:45 games available now
23:26 reader mail
Nintendo world championship game?
30:45 most anticipated of 2018
33:50 proudest 100% game
37:25 future of 3D platformers?
41:30 squad up
43:30 You're wrong

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

two's first faction rally which saw dead orbit coming out on top Bungie has announced a slew of additions coming to the game next week a particular note is the first iron banner event for destiny - featuring the return of Lord Saladin as overseer of the banner the iron banner retains broadly the same approaches in the previous game but with the significant changes combat will now be between two teams of four players and level advantages have been removed making combat about the ability of the players rather than the level they've reached in addition the previous system of bounties and ranks has been replaced by a specific iron banner Engram Engram and gun again the iron banner is still only open to players who have completed the game's full campaign and will once again provide rewards in the form of iron banner tokens along with daily and seasonal milestones for determined players there's also the addition of some brand new shiny looking armor to sweeten the pot the first iron banner
